moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 Nf6 4. Bg5 c5 5: All the tournament games start from this position.
moves.9. O-O-O Be7 10. Nxd4: Threatening a discovered attack against the Black Q.
moves.10... f5 11. Nxc6: I follow through with my plan.
moves.12. Nxd8: ...and I finish the exchange of Queens.
moves.12... Bxd8: When the dust has settled, I'm a Pawn up, and I prepare to exploit that advantage in what I anticipate will be a prolonged end game.
moves.13. g3: I want to develop my B.
moves.13... Bg5+: Black's B emerges from the back rank.
moves.14. f4: I construct my Pawn chain as I interpose.
moves.15. Bg2: I develop my B, connecting my Rooks.
moves.17... Ba6: Black discovers an attack on the B.
moves.19... Ba6: Black's move blunders away the B, and before I can capture it, Black resigns at once.
